tooltips.listPagination: Uses List Pagination instead of show more.
tooltips.adminPanelIframeDisabled: Disables the right iframe-panel on the administration page.
tooltips.activitiesCreateButtonMaxCount: A max number of create buttons to display on the Activities page.
tooltips.thumbImageCacheDisabled: Disables thumb image files being created in data/upload/thumbs directory.
tooltips.recordListMaxSizeLimit: Max number of records can be fetched in a single GET API request.
tooltips.globalSearchMaxSize: How many records are shown in the global search.
tooltips.maxSelectTextAttributeLengthForList: Text fields are cut when records accessed with a list request.
tooltips.massActionIdleCountThreshold: Record number threshold after which mass-action is processed in idle.
tooltips.exportIdleCountThreshold: Record number threshold after which export is processed in idle.
tooltips.emailReminderPortionSize: How many email reminders can be sent at once.
tooltips.notificationsMaxSize: How many in-app notifications are shown when the notification panel is shown up.
tooltips.notificationsCheckInterval: An interval between checks for new notifications (actual only if web socket is not enabled).
tooltips.popupNotificationsCheckInterval: An interval between checks for new popup notifications (actual only if web socket is not enabled).
tooltips.streamEmailWithContentEntityTypeList: To display the content of the email in stream; by default, it's available only for cases.
tooltips.recordFollowersLoadLimit: How many records loaded in the Followers field.
tooltips.authMaxFailedAttemptNumber: If number of failed login attempts (within authFailedAttemptsPeriod) exceeds the set number, then the system won't allow to login.
tooltips.eventAssignedUserIsAttendeeDisabled: If set true, then assigned user won't be automatically added to an attendee list (for meetings and calls).
tooltips.eventInvitationForceSystemSmtp: To send invitation emails from system SMTP (otherwise a user's personal account can be used).
tooltips.inlineAttachmentUploadMaxSize: max size of inline attachments in Mb (e.g. inline images for emails).
tooltips.textFilterContainsMinLength: Actual if Use 'contains' operator when filtering varchar fields parameter is enabled.
tooltips.kanbanMaxOrderNumber: A number of records that can be ordered within a group.
tooltips.kanbanMinColumnWidth: A min width of column; the horizontal scrolling will appear to prevent column being shrunk less than the specified value.
tooltips.massEmailMaxAttemptCount: How many attempts to send an email will be made (can be helpful when SMTP server is gone away).
tooltips.massEmailSiteUrl: To override the default site url (can be helpful if there's no access to your CRM from the internet, but you need to handle opting out & tracking urls; you will need to configure your server to handle requests to the specified URL).
tooltips.cleanupOrphanAttachments: Cleaning up attachments that were uploaded but not linked with any record; cleanupAttachmentsPeriod is used; an experimental parameter.
tooltips.cleanupSubscribers: Cleaning up stream subscribers for not-actual records.
tooltips.emailKeepParentTeamsEntityList: When a related email is fetched, teams of the parent record will be copied to the email; by default, it's available only for cases.
tooltips.emailAutoReplyLimit: A max number of auto-reply emails that can be sent to one recipient within a period defined by the emailAutoReplySuppressPeriod parameter.
tooltips.emailRecipientAddressMaxCount: Max number of addresses allowed in TO, CC, BCC.
tooltips.emailTemplateHtmlizerDisabled: Disables Handlebars template engine for email templates.
tooltips.applicationDescription: The text in the meta tag; by default 'EspoCRM - Open Source CRM application' text is used.
